fixes.name: # Complaints (Not Selected)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR paramSelected = SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As])
VAR prodGrouping = SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Product Grouping])
RETURN
IF(
    NOT(ISBLANK(prodGrouping)) && prodGrouping <> paramSelected,
    DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]),
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced ATTR([Product Grouping]) with SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Product Grouping]) to mirror Tableau's ATTR behaviour. Replaced [Parameters].[Selected Product] with SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As]) per parameter mapping rules. Inlined [Number of Complaints] as DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]) since that calculated field is defined as COUNTD([Complaint ID]). Returned BLANK() when condition is not met to match Tableau's implicit ELSE NULL.
fixes.type_changed_reason: References a parameter ([Parameters].[Selected Product]) and contains an aggregation (COUNTD), therefore it must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
